title: Chimichurri
directions: 1 Finely chop the parsley, fresh oregano, and garlic (or process in a food processor several pulses). Place in a small bowl.
2 Stir in the olive oil, vinegar, salt, pepper, and red pepper flakes. Adjust seasonings.
Serve immediately or refrigerate. If chilled, return to room temperature before serving. Can keep for a day or two.
ingredients: 1 cup firmly packed fresh flat-leaf parsley, trimmed of thick stems
2 Tbsps fresh oregano leaves (can sub 2 teaspoons dried oregano)
2 Tbsp red or white wine vinegar
